keyMoments.title: Mera Mera no Mi Revealed as Tournament Prize
keyMoments.description: The Mera Mera no Mi, previously eaten by Portgas D. Ace, is dramatically revealed as the prize for winning the Corrida Colosseum tournament. This shocking announcement draws massive attention and creates enormous emotional stakes for Luffy.
keyMoments.significance: This moment brings Ace's legacy back into focus and creates the central conflict driving the Corrida Colosseum arc. Doflamingo's use of the fruit as bait demonstrates his strategic manipulation, and it ultimately leads to Sabo's acquisition of the power.

abilities.description: Allows the user to create, control, and transform into fire at will.
User is immune to fire and heat-based attacks.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness to seawater and Seastone
weaknesses.description: Like all Devil Fruit users, the wielder cannot swim and is weakened by seawater and Seastone.
The Magu Magu no Mi (Magma-Magma Fruit) is superior to the Mera Mera no Mi in the elemental hierarchy.

reveals.information: The fruit has regenerated after Ace's death and is now being offered as a tournament prize
Doflamingo is using the fruit as bait to trap Luffy and disrupt the Straw Hat-Law alliance

keyMoments.title: Viola/Violet Debuts with Giro Giro no Mi
keyMoments.description: Viola makes her debut as Violet. While her Devil Fruit powers are not explicitly demonstrated in this episode, her identity as the Giro Giro no Mi user is established.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces a Devil Fruit with incredible reconnaissance abilities that will prove crucial for gathering intelligence about Doflamingo's operations and helping the Straw Hats navigate Dressrosa.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness to seawater and Seastone
weaknesses.description: Like all Devil Fruit users, the wielder cannot swim and is weakened by seawater and Seastone.

reveals.information: Viola (operating as Violet) possesses the Giro Giro no Mi
The fruit grants extended visual perception abilities
